scripts.build: npm install && npm run grunt_geomap && npm run grunt_heatmap && npm run grunt_cassandra-health-panel;
scripts.grunt_geomap: cd geomap_panel && npm install && npm run grunt && cd ..;
scripts.grunt_heatmap: cd heatmap_panel && npm install && npm run grunt && cd ..;
scripts.grunt_cassandra-health-panel: cd cassandra_health_panel && npm install && npm run grunt && cd ..;
scripts.testGeomap: cd geomap_panel; npm install; npm test;
scripts.test: npm run testEslint; npm run testCsslint; npm run testGeomap
